mapper.select: select a.s_emp_record_id,a.employee_id,b.employee_name,b.mobile,b.job_number,b.post,c.name as deptName,if(d.employee_id is null,0,1) as sendStatus from wk_hrm_salary_month_emp_record a left join wk_hrm_employee b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join wk_hrm_dept c on b.dept_id = c.dept_id left join wk_hrm_salary_slip d on a.s_emp_record_id = d.s_emp_record_id
select a.s_emp_record_id from wk_hrm_salary_month_emp_record a left join wk_hrm_employee b on a.employee_id = b.employee_id left join wk_hrm_salary_slip d on a.s_emp_record_id = d.s_emp_record_id
